Steam (ST): Until the {ruby:1868–1912:Meiji} and {ruby:1912–1926:Taisho} eras, the Ushiromiya family was great and prosperous.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 右代宮家は、明治大正の頃までは隆盛を極めたそりゃあ立派な家柄だったそうだ。

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 右代宮家一直到明治、大正時期都是非常富裕昌盛、門庭高貴的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 右代宫家一直到明治、大正时期都是非常富裕昌盛、门庭高贵的。
Indonesian (IDN): Hingga era {ruby:1868–1912:Meiji} dan {ruby:1912–1926:Taisho}, keluarga Ushiromiya sangat makmur.

Steam (ST): They owned several spinning mills, making them rich enough to just double over laughing every day as the money kept rolling in.
Umineko Project (UP): They owned several spinning mills, and were very wealthy people who merely had to fall about laughing while the money rolled in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They owned several spinning mills, so while they just laughed heartily every day, the money kept rolling in, making them very wealthy.
PC Japanese (JP): 紡績工場をいくつも持ち、毎日笑い転げてるだけで金が転がり込んでくる富豪っぷりだったらしい。
Russian (RU): Ей принадлежало несколько прядилен, поэтому пока её члены искренне смеялись изо дня в день, им в карман капали деньги, делая их богатыми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles possuíam várias ramificações, onde as pessoas eram muito ricas e apenas riam enquanto rolavam em dinheiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 擁有好幾家紡織廠，每天只需要嘻嘻哈哈地乾等著，錢就能自己滾進錢包，完全就是一副富豪的樣子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 拥有好几家纺织厂，每天只需要嘻嘻哈哈地干等着，钱就能自己滚进钱包，完全就是一副富豪的样子。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka punya beberapa pabrik pemintalan dan hidup bergelimang harta.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli Ushiromiya possedevano diversi mulini a vento, perciò mentre non facevano che ridere di cuore ogni giorno, il denaro continuava a scorrere, rendendoli molto facoltosi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pare che gli Ushiromiya possedessero diverse fabbriche tessili, e che fossero dei riccastri che rotolovano nell'oro, e che vivevano costantemente nella bambagia.
Turkish (TR): Çok sayıda iplik fabrikasına sahiptiler ve çok varlıklı insanlardı, para akarken sadece gülmekle yetiniyorlardı.

Steam (ST): Incidentally, Grandfather was a member of a branch family and had pretty much nothing to do with the main family.
Umineko Project (UP): Incidentally, Grandfather, as a member of a branch family, originally had nothing to do with the main family.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Incidentally, Grandfather, as a member of the branch family, essentially had nothing to do with the main family.
PC Japanese (JP): ちなみに祖父さまは分家筋で、本来なら右代宮本家とは何の関係もない人だった。
Russian (RU): Дед же, принадлежащий к одной из ветвей семейства, по существу, ничем не был связан с главной семьёй.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A propósito, meu avô, que era membro de uma família secundária, originalmente não tinha nenhuma relação com a família principal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而爺爺屬於分家的人，本來是個根本和右代宮本家扯不上半點關係的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而爷爷属于分家的人，本来是个根本和右代宫本家扯不上半点关系的人。
Indonesian (IDN): Kakek, sebagai anggota keluarga cabang, awalnya tidak ada hubungannya dengan keluarga utama.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Incidentalmente, il Nonno, come membro della famiglia cadetta, essenzialmente non aveva nulla a che fare con la famiglia principale.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tra l'altro il nonno, essendo membro di un ramo cadetto della famiglia Ushiromiya, non aveva essenzialmente alcun legame con il ramo principale.
Turkish (TR): Bu arada, Büyükbaba, bir şube ailesinin üyesi olarak, aslında baş aileyle hiçbir bağlantısı yoktu.

Steam (ST): Not only was he way down the list of people who could inherit the Headship, but he had hardly any contact with the glamorous main family.
Umineko Project (UP): Distantly separated from the head's inheritance, he apparently had very little involvement with the head house.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Distantly separated from the head's inheritance, his relationship with the head house was also very distant, apparently.
PC Japanese (JP): 当主継承権からも遠く、煌びやかな本家とは縁も遠かったらしい。
Russian (RU): Будучи крайне далёким от наследства главы, судя по всему, его отношения с главным домом тоже нельзя было назвать тесными.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aparentemente ele tinha pouco envolvimento com a família principal e estava muito distante da herança da casa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 和當主繼承權無緣，與光燦華麗的本家也沒什麼緣分。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 和当主继承权无缘，与光灿华丽的本家也没什么缘分。
Indonesian (IDN): Jauh dari garis suksesi, hubungannya dengan rumah utama sangat minim.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Separato da una grande distanza dall'eredità del capofamiglia, apparentemente anche i suoi rapporti con la Casata Principale erano molto distanti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A quanto pareva, era anche parecchio in basso nella linea di successione per il titolo di capofamiglia, ed era molto distante nei rapporti con il pomposo ramo principale.
Turkish (TR): Başın mirasından uzak bir şekilde, görünüşe göre baş evle çok az ilişkisi vardı.

Steam (ST): However, during the Great Kanto Earthquake in {ruby:Taisho 12:1923}, the mansion owned by the Ushiromiya family in Odawara was flattened.
Umineko Project (UP): However, during the Great Kanto Earthquake in 1923, the mansion owned by the Ushiromiya main family in Odawara was flattened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even so, during the Great Kanto Earthquake in the year Taisho 12 (1923), the mansion owned by the Ushiromiya family in Odawara was flattened.
PC Japanese (JP): ところが大正１２年の関東大震災で、当時、小田原に屋敷を持っていた右代宮本家はペッタンコ。
Russian (RU): Тем не менее, во время Великого землетрясения Канто, случившегося в 12‐м году эпохи Тайсё (1923), расположенная в Одавара принадлежащая семье Уширомия усадьба была разрушена до основания.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, durante o Grande Terremoto de Kanto, em 1923, a mansão que pertencia à família principal dos Ushiromiya, em Odawara, foi destruída.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而時至大正十二年（1923）的關東大地震，當時在小田原坐擁一座宅邸的右代宮本家，被夷為了平地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而时至大正十二年（1923）的关东大地震，当时在小田原坐拥一座宅邸的右代宫本家，被夷为了平地。

Turkish (TR): Ancak, 1923'teki Büyük Kanto Depremi sırasında, Odawara'daki Ushiromiya baş ailesine ait malikane yerle bir oldu.

Steam (ST): The spinning mills in Tokyo were all burned down in a huge fire, and the Ushiromiya family lost most of its wealth and family members in an instant.
Umineko Project (UP): The spinning mills in Tokyo were all burned down in a huge fire, and the Ushiromiya family lost most of its wealth and family members in an instant.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The spinning mills in Tokyo were all burned down in a huge fire, and the Ushiromiya family lost most of its wealth and family members in an instant.
PC Japanese (JP): 東京下町に持っていた紡績工場は大火事で全焼し、右代宮家は一瞬にして主だった親族と財産を丸ごと失ったんだそうだ。
Russian (RU): Находящиеся в Токио прядильни поглотил Великий пожар, и семья Уширомия в один миг лишилась большей части своего богатства и членов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A ramificação que vivia em Tóquio foi completamente queimada devido a um grande incêndio e a família Ushiromiya perdeu a maior parte de sua riqueza e membros em um instante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 位於東京下城區的紡織廠也被一場大火毀於一旦，右代宮家在一瞬間人財兩亡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 位于东京下城区的纺织厂也被一场大火毁于一旦，右代宫家在一瞬间人财两亡。
Indonesian (IDN): Pabrik-pabrik di Tokyo habis terbakar, dan keluarga Ushiromiya kehilangan hampir seluruh harta dan anggotanya dalam sekejap.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I cotonifici nei quartieri bassi di Tokyo finirono ridotti in cenere da un possente incendio, e la famiglia Ushiromiya perse in un istante tutto il parentado a suo capo, insieme alle sue ricchezze.
Turkish (TR): Tokyo'daki iplik fabrikalarının hepsi büyük bir yangında kül oldu, ve Ushiromiya ailesi servetinin ve aile üyelerinin çoğunu bir anda kaybetti.

Steam (ST): So, once they started trying to figure out who the successor to the Ushiromiya family should be, they apparently found no one remaining except Kinzo in his branch family.
Umineko Project (UP): It then became a matter of who would become the heir to the main family, and as it turned out, none were left except for Kinzo, who was as far removed from the main family line as they come.

Russian (RU): Когда же встал вопрос, кому стать наследником главной семьи, оказалось, что из возможных кандидатов осталась лишь ветвь семейства, к которой принадлежал Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tudo se tornou uma questão de quem iria herdar a chefia da família, e com todos esses acontecimentos, o único que restou foi Kinzo, que era o mais distante da linhagem principal.

Steam (ST): In Kinzo's later reminiscences, he referred to this as good fortune so great that it overturned fate.
Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo himself later said that it was such good luck, it was as though fate itself had been turned upside‐down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo himself later said that it was such good luck, it was as though fate itself had been turned upside-down.
PC Japanese (JP): 本人は後にこのことを、運命がひっくり返るほどの強運だったと述懐してる。
Russian (RU): Потом, позже, Кинзо говорил, что это была такая удача, словно сама судьба встала с ног на голову.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kinzo disse, mais tarde, como teve sorte, como se o destino tivesse sido virado de cabeça para baixo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他本人懷念地提起這件事的時候，總是把它比作能將命運都推翻的強運。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他本人怀念地提起这件事的时候，总是把它比作能将命运都推翻的强运。
Indonesian (IDN): Kinzo sendiri bilang ini keberuntungan besar, seperti takdir yang terbalik.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kinzo stesso più tardi disse che era stata una gran fortuna, come se il fato stesso si fosse capovolto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Lui stesso in seguito rammentò che era stato un colpo di fortuna talmente grande da stravolgere il corso degli eventi.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo'nun kendisi daha sonra bunun çok iyi bir şans olduğunu, sanki kaderin tersine döndüğünü söyledi.

Steam (ST): With that, Grandfather's boring, everyday life did a 180. He was entrusted with reviving the dying Ushiromiya family, which had lost nearly all of its wealth.
Umineko Project (UP): With that, Grandfather's ordinary life did a 180.{n}He was entrusted with reviving the wealth that the dying Ushiromiya family had almost completely lost.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): With that, Grandfather's normal life did a 180. He was entrusted with reviving the wealth that the dying Ushiromiya family had almost completely lost.
PC Japanese (JP): それで、平凡だった祖父さまの生活は一転。財産のほとんどを失った瀕死の右代宮家の再興を託されることになった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それで、平凡だった祖父さまの生活は一転。{n}財産のほとんどを失った瀕死の右代宮家の再興を託されることになった。
Russian (RU): Вот так нормальная жизнь, которую дед доселе вёл, совершила поворот на 180 градусов.{n}Ему доверили возрождение практически утерянного погибающей семьёй Уширомия богатства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com isso, a vida normal dele deu uma volta de 180º.{n}Foi confiado a ele reviver todas as riquezas perdidas da família Ushiromiya, as quais estavam quase que completamente perdidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以此為契機，爺爺告別了平凡的生活。{n}他擔負起了復興已經沒什麼財產，瀕臨滅亡的右代宮家的重任。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以此为契机，爷爷告别了平凡的生活。{n}他担负起了复兴已经没什么财产，濒临灭亡的右代宫家的重任。
Indonesian (IDN): Sejak itu, hidup Kakek berubah 180 derajat.{n}Dia ditugaskan menghidupkan kembali kekayaan keluarga Ushiromiya yang hampir punah.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così, la normale vita del Nonno ebbe una svolta di 180 gradi. Gli fu affidato il compito di restaurare la ricchezza che la morente famiglia Ushiromiya aveva quasi completamente perso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E così, la vita ordinaria del nonno ebbe un risvolto inaspettato. Gli venne affidato il compito di ripristinare le ricchezze quasi completamente perse dalla famiglia Ushiromiya, in procinto di scomparire.
Turkish (TR): Bununla birlikte, Büyükbabanın sıradan hayatı 180 derece değişti.{n}Ölmek üzere olan Ushiromiya ailesinin neredeyse tamamen kaybettiği serveti yeniden canlandırmakla görevlendirildi.

Steam (ST): However, just because he had been entrusted with this task didn't mean he could accomplish it. Apparently, those around him weren't really expecting much.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, just because you suddenly dump a task on someone doesn't mean they can do squat to accomplish it.{n}I doubt the people around him were expecting much.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Naturally, just because he had been entrusted with this task didn't mean he could accomplish it. It seems that the surrounding people weren't really expecting much.
PC Japanese (JP): もっとも、いきなり託されたって何ができるわけでもない。周りの人間たちもそう多くを期待はしなかったろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もっとも、いきなり託されたって何ができるわけでもない。{n}周りの人間たちもそう多くを期待はしなかったろう。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, только то, что ему доверили такую задачу, ещё не значило, что он с ней обязательно справится.{n}Похоже, окружающие люди не ожидали от него многого.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, só porque você, de repente, dá uma tarefa para uma pessoa, isso não quer dizer que ela vá conseguir realizar no mesmo momento.{n}Eu duvido que as pessoas ao seu redor esperassem algo dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，突然擔負起如此重任，本來也很難做出什麼實績。{n}他周圍的人也根本沒對他抱有多大的期待吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，突然担负起如此重任，本来也很难做出什么实绩。{n}他周围的人也根本没对他抱有多大的期待吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Tentu saja, memberi tugas begitu saja tidak membuat seseorang otomatis mampu melakukannya.{n}Orang-orang di sekitarnya pasti tidak berharap banyak.

Russian (RU): Он воспользовался всеми капиталами семьи, а также всем, чем владел, от волос на голове до пальцев ног, в качестве залога, чтобы взять взаймы огромную сумму денег, организовал гигантский приток капитала и вскоре возродил семейное дело.
